TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DataGridViewElementStates extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the user interface (UI) state of a element within a control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Although these different states, like Frozen, are enforced by the UI, they can be programmatically overruled.
## Examples The following code example illustrates the use of this type. For more information, see [How to: Perform a Custom Action Based on Changes in a Cell of a Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#135](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.windows.forms.d_62_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#135](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.windows.forms.d_62_1.vb)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates Displayed = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Indicates the an element is currently displayed onscreen.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates Frozen = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Indicates that an element cannot be scrolled through the UI.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Indicates that an element is in its default state.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates ReadOnly = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Indicates that an element will not accept user input to change its value.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates Resizable = int32(8)

Docs.summary: Indicates that an element can be resized through the UI. This value is ignored except when combined with the ResizableSet value.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates ResizableSet = int32(16)

Docs.summary: Indicates that an element does not inherit the resizable state of its parent.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates Selected = int32(32)

Docs.summary: Indicates that an element is in a selected (highlighted) UI state.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates Visible = int32(64)

Docs.summary: Indicates that an element is visible (displayable).
